oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Church Street at Fifth Avenue, Nashville, Tennessee, 1955 December 22
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A street scene view of Church Street at 5th Avenue N at “Cain-Sloan corner” in downtown Nashville, Tennessee, on December 22, 1955. Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cain-Sloan Department Store (Nashville, Tenn.); Harvey’s Department Store (Nashville, Tenn.)
